name: Abandoned Colony
description: The ruins of a once-thriving settlement are scattered across the surface, now home only to ghosts and scavengers.

name: Civil War
description: Vicious factional conflict has torn this world apart, leaving its people desperate and its infrastructure in ruins.

name: Hostile Life
description: The local flora or fauna is extremely dangerous to human life, requiring constant vigilance.

name: Valuable Minerals
description: The planet is rich in rare and valuable minerals, attracting mining corporations and prospectors.

name: Research Outpost
description: A small, dedicated team of scientists is here to study a unique planetary phenomenon.

name: Ice Mining
description: Vast fields of frozen water or gases are being harvested for shipment to dryer worlds.

name: Forbidden Zone
description: Certain areas of the planet are restricted by automated defense systems or ancient edicts.

name: Ocean Cities
description: Floating or underwater metropolises house the planet's entire population.

name: Ecumenopolis
description: A world-spanning city where every square inch of the surface is covered in urban sprawl and industrial machinery.

name: Colony
description: A recently established settlement focusing on growth and resource extraction.

name: Terraforming Project
description: Ongoing efforts are being made to alter the planet's environment to make it more suitable for human habitation.

name: Pleasure World
description: A popular tourist destination known for its entertainment, resorts, and recreational activities.

name: Prison Planet
description: A remote world used to incarcerate dangerous criminals, often with harsh environmental conditions.

name: Corporate Enclave
description: A heavily fortified area controlled by a powerful corporation, often serving as a hub for business and industry.

name: Xeno Preserve
description: A protected area dedicated to the study and conservation of alien flora and fauna.

name: Forge World
description: An industrial powerhouse planet focused on manufacturing and heavy industry.

name: Terraforming Failure
description: An attempted terraforming project that went awry, resulting in a hostile and unstable environment.

name: Garden World
description: A lush, verdant planet teeming with plant life and diverse ecosystems, often used for agriculture and recreation.

name: Regional Hegemon
description: A dominant political and military power in its region, exerting influence over neighboring worlds.

name: Rising Hegemon
description: An emerging power that is rapidly expanding its influence and control over nearby systems.

name: Quarantined World
description: A planet under strict quarantine due to a deadly disease outbreak or other biohazard.

name: Pilgrimage Site
description: A sacred location that attracts visitors from across the galaxy for religious or spiritual reasons.

name: Active Battlefield
description: A planet currently embroiled in conflict, with ongoing battles and military operations.

name: Rampant Slavery
description: A world where slavery is widespread and systematically enforced.

name: Cultural Center
description: A hub of art, music, and cultural exchange, attracting visitors and residents alike.

name: Agri World
description: A planet primarily dedicated to agriculture and food production, often featuring vast farmlands and bio-domes.

name: Planetary Rings
description: A spectacular system of dust, ice, and rock orbits the planet, providing both a scientific wonder and a source of raw materials.

name: Tidally Locked
description: The planet's rotation matches its orbit; one side is trapped in eternal, scorching day, while the other is lost to absolute, frozen night.

name: Bioluminescent Biosphere
description: The planet's ecosystem is defined by life that generates its own light, creating glowing forests and luminous oceans visible from space.

name: Orbital Graveyard
description: The space surrounding this world is a lethal thicket of ancient ship hulls and debris from a forgotten interstellar conflict.

name: Failed Colony
description: A recent attempt to settle this world has ended in disaster. Empty prefabs and silent distress beacons are all that remain.

name: Heavy Gravity
description: The planet's immense mass creates a crushing gravitational pull, requiring specialized equipment or genetic adaptation for humans to survive.
